ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9

about.summary: Mostly MATLAB-compatible fuzzy logic toolkit for GNU Octave

build.script:
tar -czf ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz ${{ name }}
octave -W -H --eval "pkg install -global -verbose ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz"

mkdir -p $PREFIX/bin
cp $RECIPE_DIR/post-link.sh $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh
chmod +x $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh

tests.script:
octave -W -H --eval "\
  pkg list; \
  pkg load ${{ name }}; disp('${{ name }} loaded') \
"

about.summary: Mostly MATLAB-compatible fuzzy logic toolkit for GNU Octave

build.script:
tar -czf ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz ${{ name }}
octave -W -H --eval "pkg install -global -verbose ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz"

mkdir -p $PREFIX/bin
cp $RECIPE_DIR/post-link.sh $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh
chmod +x $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh

tests.script:
octave -W -H --eval "\
  pkg list; \
  pkg load ${{ name }}; disp('${{ name }} loaded') \
"

name: octave-fuzzy-logic-toolkit
raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: fuzzy-logic-toolkit
  version: "0.6.2"

package:
  name: octave-${{ name }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/lmarkowsky/fuzzy-logic-toolkit/archive/refs/tags/${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 804aa3501105d6a6391307ace4e4d1f4dd91d0a248cb53ce3b2365377e900132
  target_directory: ${{ name }}

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  script: |
    tar -czf ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz ${{ name }}
    octave -W -H --eval "pkg install -global -verbose ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz"

    mkdir -p $PREFIX/bin
    cp $RECIPE_DIR/post-link.sh $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh
    chmod +x $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh

requirements:
  host:
    - octave
  run:
    - octave

tests:
  - script: |
      octave -W -H --eval "\
        pkg list; \
        pkg load ${{ name }}; disp('${{ name }} loaded') \
      "

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/lmarkowsky/fuzzy-logic-toolkit
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: ${{ name }}/COPYING
  summary: Mostly MATLAB-compatible fuzzy logic toolkit for GNU Octave

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - arjxn-py
